item.title: 15-Hour Qantas Flight Takes Passengers From Perth to Perth Amid Mideast Closures
item.description: Flights on Monday and Tuesday were delayed and diverted because of temporary air space closures in the region.

item.title: The Middle East tries to untangle travel after attacks and airspace closures.
item.description: Nearly half of all Qatar Airways flights were canceled on Tuesday, causing headaches and confusion around the world.
